community_listings.title: Rhizome Community: Digital Art & New Media Opportunities
community_listings.description: The Rhizome community page features digital art and new media culture listings including exhibitions, opportunities, events, and jobs. Automated scraping is blocked by Cloudflare protection (403 Forbidden).

community_listings.title: Open Calls for New Media Artists
community_listings.description: Rhizome regularly features open calls for digital artists, net artists, and new media practitioners. These typically include exhibition opportunities, commissions, and collaborative projects.

community_listings.title: Digital Art Exhibitions & Screenings
community_listings.description: Upcoming exhibitions and screenings of internet art, software art, generative works, and digital culture projects.

community_listings.title: Artist Residencies & Fellowships
community_listings.description: Technology-focused artist residencies, research fellowships, and creative funding opportunities emphasizing experimental approaches to digital media.

community_listings.title: Teaching Positions in Digital Arts
community_listings.description: Faculty positions, visiting artist roles, and teaching opportunities in new media, digital art, and creative coding programs.

community_listings.title: Curatorial Opportunities
community_listings.description: Curatorial positions and open calls for curators working with digital art, net art, and technology-based practices.

community_listings.title: Technical Roles in Arts Organizations
community_listings.description: Technical and creative technologist positions at museums, galleries, and arts organizations working with digital preservation.

community_listings.title: Community Events & Workshops
community_listings.description: Workshops, talks, symposiums, and community gatherings focused on digital culture, internet art, and creative technology.

community_listings.title: Digital Preservation Projects
community_listings.description: Opportunities related to digital art preservation, net art conservation, and archival projects.

community_listings.title: Commissions & Project Funding
community_listings.description: Commission opportunities and project grants for digital artists, including support for internet-based works.

note: Rhizome.org uses Cloudflare protection blocking automated requests. This data represents typical community listing categories. For current opportunities, visit https://rhizome.org/community/ directly.
alternative_solutions: Use Playwright/Puppeteer with full browser engine (~300MB)
Check if Rhizome provides an RSS feed
